attributes.additional_details: Devon has a past of being apart of Cornwall or better known as Dumnonia in the past, We believe this will also give more potential to both Cornwall and Devon.
attributes.background: We urge the UK Government to formally recognize Devon as part of Cornwall as it was apart of Cornwall many years ago and it has historic and cultural ties to Cornwall and it deserves its recognition.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call for a clear action that is the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament.

We are unclear what specific action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take. For example, we are not sure if you would like local government reorganisation.

You could start a new petition setting out clearly what you would like to happen.
